about.heading1: Hi Everyone, I am Nguyen Dinh Bao An from Da Nang, VietNam.
about.heading2: I am a third year student at FPT University, majoring in Information Technology.
about.heading3: I focus on interactive web programming, including FrontEnd, BackEnd and Database development. My short term goal is to develop my expertise in the IT field.
about.heading4: My long term goal is to become an expert in web development, contributing to large and innovative projects.
about.heading5: Apart from coding, some other activities that I love to do!
